snippet: South Korea’s president, Lee Myung-bak, is among a small number of global leaders who seem to have pierced President Obama’s reserve. Mr. Lee arrives Wednesday for a state visit.
lead_paragraph: South Korea’s president, Lee Myung-bak, is among a small number of global leaders who seem to have pierced President Obama’s reserve. Mr. Lee arrives Wednesday for a state visit.

headline.main: S. Korean State Visit Highlights Bond Between 2 Leaders
headline.print_headline: Bond Informs Visit by South Korean Leader
headline.seo: Visit by South Korean Leader Highlights Bond With Obama
